name: Pirate Racer
description:
Unfinished game for PizzaJam 2017

Top-Down 2D Pirate Racer. Use W/S to speed up/slow down, A/D to turn, E/Q to rotate your cannon, and Space to fire.

Rocks are destructible obstacles which are placed randomly each time the game is run.

Was very excited to work on this, just didn't have time to flesh it out as much as I wanted. I'll definitely be continuing to work on this in the future.
